Banner.intro: If you're looking for a skilled web developer with a passion for creating professional websites, look no further! With 4 years of experience in the field, I'm dedicated to delivering high-quality work that meets my clients' needs and exceeds their expectations. Whether you're looking for a simple, elegant website or a complex, feature-rich platform, I have the expertise and creativity to bring your vision to life. Let's work together to build something amazing!

GoTo.a: In charge of transitionning legacy features (modularly) into a newer platform developed with React, allowing 85% of clients to have a more modern experience
GoTo.b: Created fully functional, tested and documented components for internal teams to use across submodules throughout their development
GoTo.c: Collaborated with UI/UX to bring forth a better experience for existing and potentially new clients
GoTo.d: Demo'ing features in front of clients, showcasing the team's effort

Desjardins.a: Lead the development and introduced rigorous coding standards of our frontend application in Typescript using StencilJS
Desjardins.b: Developed new features for Desjardins' applications using the latest trends in tech and architecture
Desjardins.c: Successfully set up our continuous integration pipeline from scratch which improved our deployment performance significantly (~5x) using Concourse CI
Desjardins.d: Successfully setup an API for our backend to accept calls from other internal applications using Spring Boot

Bell.a: Team lead for the entire lifecycle of the project. Created the UX design and the entire base architecture of the app's frontend
Bell.b: Created automated testing (unit and integration testing) for every new feature added
Bell.c: After project completion, switched to the backend team and helped develop and maintain new features in C#
Bell.d: Debug, fixed a complex database system and helped update the backend automated migrations scripts

Discord.a: Developed a discord bot with integrated commands and a queue system that plays music across channels using purely NodeJS
Discord.b: Setup an EC2 Instance with automated configuration using Terraform and Ansible, allowing my bot to run 24/7 on it

Portfolio.a: Developed a portfolio website using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS
Portfolio.b: Setup an statically hosted S3 bucket that runs on a Hosted Zone, allowing me to automatically sync changes to the website with the run of a simple command
Portfolio.c: Using several libraries such as EmailJS for client contacts and i18n-next handling locales

Pickside.a: Eventually to be an event planner/manager for sports activities across several regions (Quebec, Toronto, etc...)
Pickside.b: Developed a REST API with OAuth Bearer token authentication, in NodeJS that is also connected to a MongoDB server
Pickside.c: Frontend connected to Google's official map service which will eventually become viable when the code is fully built
Pickside.d: Developed the frontend in React 18 with a well structured repo using custom hooks and Material-UI (will eventually move to tailwind CSS).

Sadboiss.a: Developed a very small E-Commerce website with a working cart, login system and an attempted payment system
Sadboiss.b: Used C# for the backend with a structured MySQL database and a migration system
Sadboiss.c: Used React for the frontend (no custom hooks) with old school reducers and action creators (Redux)

Project portfolio description: A website portfolio is an essential tool for any professional who wants to showcase their work online. If you're looking to create a website portfolio that showcases your skills and accomplishments, I will help you.
Full-fledged application description: If your project is a bit more complex and you're looking for a complete solution, I have you covered. Together, we can turn your brilliant ideas into reality. I will work with you to design, conceptualize, and build your project from scratch.
Hosting/Infrastructure description: If you're having trouble finding ways to host your website, or you simply don't understand the process, there's no need to worry. I'm here to help you with that.
Maintenance description: I will maintain your website and ensure that it stays up-to-date with the latest technologies, guaranteeing its continuous functionality.
Designed and implemented an online store: Designed and implemented an online store application from start to finish using React JS and Redux
Use of custom hooks through out the fron: Use of custom hooks through out the frontend to make use of better implementation design
Successfully developed a REST API backen: Successfully developed a REST API backend in with NodeJS
Implemented an Auth0 support for authent: Implemented an Auth0 support for authentication through the backend
Attached a functional mongodb database t: Attached a functional mongodb database to my backend with an initializer script that populates collections upon first start
I'm Fullstack developer with over 4 year: I'm a Fullstack developer with over 4 years of experience
About me content: I have a passion for helping people build their online presence. My expertise lies in creating custom websites that are tailored to your unique needs. Whether you're a small business owner looking to establish an online presence, or an individual looking to showcase your portfolio, I can help bring your vision to life.
